price: او كله چې د مريم د زوى مثال بيان كړى شي نو ستا قوم يو دم د خوښۍ شور ماشور جوړ كړي.
arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
